attributes.title: Terraria
attributes.caption: With Joel and Adam (who?) smelt.
attributes.description: Nobody reads these. What is wrong with you Ok, fine, let's do this. Watch as Adam Ellis (who) teach Joel how to smelt ore in this four hour long documentary shot entirely (mostly) on location in Terrer... Terrererrr... in this game.

attributes.title: Dark Souls 2 with Joel & Adam
attributes.caption: Dark Souls 2
attributes.description: Apparently the answer is [ LB ], forward [ R2 ], [BR1] and not [ X ]. ... So, really, you don't even have to watch the video.

attributes.title: Magicka with Joel & Adam
attributes.caption: Magicka
attributes.description: [ W ] + [ A ] + [ Spacebar ], [ W ] + [ A ] + [ Spacebar ], [ W ] + [ A ] + [ Spacebar ] ...Repeat.

attributes.title: Dreadout

attributes.description: Joel and Adam sing songs and run from a pig.

attributes.title: Speak French
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Le franais est une langue romane parle par environ 175 millions de personnes dans le monde. Aujourd'hui, il est utilis dans tous les pays du monde, y compris en France, Belgique, Canada, Suisse, Luxembourg, Monaco, Algrie, Cameroun, Hati, Liban, Madagascar, Martinique, Monaco, Maroc, Niger, Sngal, Tunisie, Vietnam, et est une langue officielle dans 29 pays ainsi que diverses institutions internationales telles que les Nations unies et l'Union europenne. Il est souvent considr comme l'un des plus beaux et romantiques langues dans le monde et, en tant que langue trangre, est la deuxime langue la plus enseigne dans le monde aprs l'anglais.

attributes.title: Baking Simulator with Joel and Adam
attributes.caption: Baking Simulator
attributes.description: World renown Pastry Chef Joel Heyman and his Sous Chef Adam Ellis take us on a culinary adventure through the world of cake baking.

attributes.title: Octodad
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Joel and Adam show us the only type of tentacle video that we're allowed to upload.

attributes.title: Papers Please
attributes.caption: with Gus, Joel, and Adam
attributes.description: Gus, Joel, and Adam show you how to navigate the complex politics of eastern block checkpoints/borders. Which is completely irrelevant right now. I'm not going to write anything about Ukraine here. Promise.

attributes.title: Among The Sleep
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Adam and Joel give parenting a try in Among The Sleep.

attributes.title: Titanfall, Game Update Four
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Joel and Adam take you through the intricacies of the game four update by cursing and screaming at each other. They also play Titanfall.

attributes.description: Joel and Adam slap the crap out of each other.

attributes.title: Taze

attributes.description: In this video, Adam & Joel *TTZZZTTT* OW GET THAT THE FUCK OFF ME--

attributes.title: Hohokum
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Joel and Adam take a calm and relaxing journey through the world of Hohokum. Thank you to the PlayStation people for sponsoring this video.

attributes.title: P.T.
attributes.caption: with Joel, Adam & Kerry
attributes.description: Joel just wants to be a peaceful person. He wants to walk around, go to the grocery store, buy protein bars, maybe some orange juice, go to his car, go back to his place, watch television, and play Minecraft. Instead, they ruin Kerry's day.

attributes.title: Destiny - Earth's Golden Chests
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Joel shows you how to find the five golden chests on Earth while Adam's eye falls out.

attributes.title: Murder
attributes.caption: with Jeremy, Matt, Adam, and Joel
attributes.description: Jeremy, Matt, Adam, and Joel show you how to murder each other. They also made this video. I've used that joke like nine times already... Whatever, watch with your face.

attributes.title: Prop Hunt
attributes.caption: with Jeremy, Matt, Adam, and Joel
attributes.description: Jeremy, Matt, Adam, and Joel determine what is a bottle, and what is a man disguised as a bottle, trying to look like the other bottles, without acting suspiciously like a bottle... PROP HUNT!

attributes.title: Destiny - The Moon's Golden Chests
attributes.caption: with Joel, Adam, and Matt
attributes.description: Joel wouldn't stop talking, so Matt joins Adam in finding the Moon's golden chests in Destiny.

attributes.title: Destiny - Venus' Golden Chests
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Joel is back... But something is... off. Here's how to find the gold chests on Venus.

attributes.title: Soccer

attributes.title: Destiny - Mars' Golden Chests

attributes.description: Adam and Joel show us where to find the final five golden chests in Destiny...And Joel gets a special prize.

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead 2
attributes.caption: with Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy
attributes.description: Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy fight off zombies. A lot of zombies. More zombies than four people could handle... unless those four people are Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy.

attributes.title: Alien Isolation
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Joel & Adam take you on a journey to... AHHH! GET IT OFF! GET IT OFF! AH GOD!

attributes.title: State of Decay
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: If you're really into long introductions that seemingly go on forever and ever then you'll love this video's description of State of Decay's DLC Breakdown. Then you'll go on to love the description of State of Decay's DLC Lifeline, which this video is actually suppose to be about. In any case, we're sure this description has gone on too long.

attributes.title: Space Engineers
attributes.caption: Space Engineers
attributes.description: Joel & Adam show you how to argue the merits of the 'Kessel Run', all while in zero G.

attributes.title: Behind the Scenes Halloween Special
attributes.caption: Outlast
attributes.description: Revenge is a dish best served in a dark, haunted, and probably mostly asbestos filled hallway.

attributes.title: Outlast Halloween Special
attributes.caption: Outlast
attributes.description: Funny how a 150 year old 'partially' abandoned asylum, some batteries, and a $29.95 ghost meter can result in the death of 6 people. Weird.

attributes.title: The Crew
attributes.caption: with Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy
attributes.description: Need to know how to drive Or how to drive fast How about how to drive fast with friends How about how to drive fast with Joel, Adam, Jeremy, and Matt They're playing the crew. Drive fast.

attributes.title: The Evil Within
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: The following re-enactment was contained in a controlled environment where the actors were supervised by a supervisor under the strict guidance of the trained professional who was monitored by medical personnel throughout the course. Medical personnel monitored the trained professional strictly guiding the supervisor supervising the actors in the environment which was controlled and contained during the re-enactment. Please do not get injured, die, or damage property by attempting to recreate these re-creations.

attributes.title: Depth
attributes.caption: with Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy
attributes.description: Joel, Adam, Jeremy, and Matt dive into the deep dark waters of Depth to collect gold and hunt sharks. Wait, did someone say sharks Sharks Where BEHIND YOU! OH GOD MY LEGS!

attributes.caption: with Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy

attributes.title: World of Tanks
attributes.caption: Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy

attributes.title: Slap Part 2

attributes.title: Tea Party Simulator
attributes.caption: Tea Party Simulator
attributes.description: Joel and Adam head to a tropical island to have a nice tea party, but things on the island aren't what they seem. Smoke monsters and things like that. Who knows anymore. Dharma.
